channel.title: 667: Making Dialogues: Help me?
channel.description:
Hello,
Would anyone help me out? Every time I try to add a Dialogue for "Pikkupstix" Summoning guy ID = 6970 it always has an error. I do it correctly. So if anyone would like to explain the steps on making a Dialogue, please do so I can refer to it because i'm confused on what i'm doing wrong.

item.title: 667: Making Dialogues: Help me?
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

Look for tutorials in the Tutorials Section.

Read full topic
